snippet: Why "America the Beautiful" is the wrong song for Mitt Romney to be quoting.
abstract: Why "America the Beautiful" is the wrong song for Mitt Romney to be quoting.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES - It is jarring, in an age of irony and nuance, to hear Mitt Romney conclude his stump speeches with a riff on the hymn, "America the Beautiful." At an early-morning rally today, a few hours before the Iowa caucuses begin, he discussed his love for the patriotic song - probably the most beloved in the canon - and recited several of the song's verses, strongly suggesting that its vision of the country differed from President Obama's.

headline.main: When Romney's Reach Exceeds His Grasp
